content: rs sl1 k to 1 st before gap made by previous k to lsp distribute sts evenly between 2 needles lsp turn ssk k1 turn and rsp being at the ends repeat row 3 & 4 2 3 5 6 1 2 3 4 0 1 2 3 more grafting times the final two row repeats will end at p2tog/ssk 12 14 18 20 10 12 14 16 8 10 12 14 sts remain break yarn with 18 tail and thread onto a darning from heel flap & heel turn needle dn hold the two needles parallel in the left hand begin at the right-most stitches do not turn after working last row 4 1 insert dn into 1st st on front needle purlwise and pull gusset yarn through leaving st on needle pick up and knit 10 12 16 18 8 10 12 14 6 8 10 2 insert dn into 1st st on rear needle knitwise and pull 12 sts along the left side of the heel flap pm or note yarn through leaving st on needle this as left side point lsp in some manner 3 insert dn into 1st st on front needle knitwise letting knit across the 20 24 32 36 16 20 24 28 12 16 st fall off needle then insert dn into next st on front 20 24 instep sts pm or note this as right side point needle purlwise leaving st on needle pull yarn through rsp in some manner 4 insert dn into 1st st on rear needle purlwise letting st pick up and knit 10 12 16 18 8 10 12 14 6 8 10 fall off needle then insert dn into next st on rear 12 sts along the right side of the heel flap then knit 6 needle knitwise leaving st on needle pull yarn through 7 9 10 5 6 7 8 4 5 6 7 sts from heel turn and repeat steps 3 and 4 until all sts are grafted together combine with right-side flap sts weave in all ends the beginning-of-round now occurs at this point in the middle of the bottom of the heel pm or note this as beginning of round bor in some manner toe-up decreasing round 1 k to 3 sts before lsp k2tog k1 work to rsp k1 ssk k to end of round 2 sts decreased toe decreasing round 2 k using judy s magic cast on https //bit ly/3rtuf9t cast repeat decreasing rounds 1 & 2 another 5 6 8 9 4 on 20 24 32 36 16 20 24 28 12 16 20 24 sts 5 6 7 3 4 5 6 more times 40 48 64 72 32 40 48 total 10 12 16 18 8 10 12 14 6 8 10 12 sts on 56 24 32 40 48 sts remain each needle foot and toe k 1 round toe increase round 1 *k1 m1l k to last st on needle continue in stockinette
